content: अभिवृत् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To go up to, go towards, go or come near, approach; used with or without any <ab>acc.</ab>; इत एवाभिवर्तंते (in dramas) are coming hitherward or in this direction; श्रावस्तीमभ्यवर्तिषि <ls>Dk. 116</ls>; तमर्च्यमारादभिर्वतमानं <ls>R. 2. 10</ls>; यतो यतः षट्चरणोभिवर्तते <ls>Ś. 1. 23</ls> turns. {@--2@} To attack, assail, rush upon or towards, turn towards (inimically or to attack); वदनं मे मधुकरोऽ भिवर्तते <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; अयमेकचरोऽभिवर्तते मां <ls>Ki. 13. 3.</ls> {@--3@} To face, encounter, stand opposite to. {@--4@} To stretch or extend towards; द्रीर्घारण्यानि दक्षिणां दिशमभिवर्तंते <ls>U. 2.</ls> {@--5@} ({%a%}) To turn up, arise, begin. ({%b%}) To appear, commence, break (as day). {@--6@} To be, exist, chance to be. {@--7@} To procure for one (<ab>dat.</ab>). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To carry over, transport. {@--2@} To overcome, to be master of.
